name: Yummyusment☆Mignon
effectText: "Yummy" monsters you control gain 500 ATK for each LIGHT Beast monster on the field. You can only use each of the following effects of "Yummyusment☆Mignon" once per turn. If you control a Link-1 monster: You can target 1 Level 1 "Yummy" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If this card is in your GY: You can target 2 "Yummy" monsters in your GY and/or banishment; place this card, and them, on the bottom of the Deck in any order.
